import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import GridItem from "components/Grid/GridItem.js"; import GridContainer from "components/Grid/GridContainer.js"; // import Table from "components/Table/Table.js"; import Table from '@material-ui/core/Table'; import TableBody from '@material-ui/core/TableBody'; import TableCell from '@material-ui/core/TableCell'; import TableHead from '@material-ui/core/TableHead'; import TableRow from '@material-ui/core/TableRow'; import Card from "components/Card/Card.js"; import CardHeader from "components/Card/CardHeader.js"; import CardBody from "components/Card/CardBody.js"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; // import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Button from "components/CustomButtons/Button.js"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { showEmployee } from 'redux/EmployeeAction' import EditIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Edit'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar'; // import ExpansionPanel from 'components/ExpansionPanel/ExpansionPanel' // import Modal from 'components/Modal/Modal'; const styles = { cardCategoryWhite: { "&,& a,& a:hover,& a:focus": { color: "rgba(255,255,255,.62)", margin: "0", fontSize: "14px", marginTop: "0", marginBottom: "0", fontFamily: "'Roboto', 'Helvetica', 'Arial', sans-serif" }, "& a,& a:hover,& a:focus": { color: "#FFFFFF" } }, cardTitleWhite: { color: "#FFFFFF", marginTop: "0px", minHeight: "auto", fontWeight: "300", fontFamily: "'Roboto', 'Helvetica', 'Arial', sans-serif", marginBottom: "3px", display: 'inline-block', textDecoration: "none", "& small": { color: "#777", fontSize: "65%", fontWeight: "400", lineHeight: "1" } }, table: { border: 0, }, tableCell: { border: 0, padding: 3, // minWidth:'auto', // width:'140px' // maxWidth:'5%' }, tableRow: { marginTop: 25, marginBottom: 5, }, addBtn: { float: 'right', display: 'inline-block', }, filelink:{ width:'100%', // backgroundColor:'#eeeeee', color:'black', height:'20px', width:'auto', padding:'5px 20px', marginRight:'10px', // borderRadius:'1%' } // button:{ // flexDirection: 'row', // justifyContent: 'flex-end', // alignSelf: 'flex-end', // alignItems: 'flex-end' // } }; const useStyles = makeStyles(styles); function Employee(props) { const classes = useStyles(); const data = useSelector(state => state) const dispatch = useDispatch(); let pictureBlob = new Blob(data.picture, { type: 'image/jpeg' }); const pictureBlobUrl = URL.createObjectURL(pictureBlob) useEffect(() => { // dispatch({ type:'SHOW_EMPLOYEE' }) dispatch(showEmployee()) }, []) return (
{/* in cardheader we can use plain attribute */}

Employee Details

{/* fdsd fdsd */} {/* dghj */} {data.fullName != "" ?
{/* */} {/* {data.image ? */} {/* : ""} */} Employee Information Full Name: {data.fullName ? data.fullName : "Not Set"} BirthDate: {data.birthDate ? data.birthDate : "Not Set"} Gender: {data.gender ? data.gender : "Not Set"} Marital Status: {data.maritalStatus ? data.maritalStatus : "Not Set"}
Current Address Street 1: {data.currentStreet1 ? data.currentStreet1 : "Not Set"} Street 2: {data.currentStreet2 ? data.currentStreet2 : "Not Set"} City: {data.currentCity ? data.currentCity : "Not Set"} State: {data.currentState ? data.currentState : "Not Set"} Country: {data.currentCountry ? data.currentCountry : "Not Set"} Current Address Proof: { data.currentAddressProof.map(file => { let currentAddressProofBlob = new Blob([file], { type: 'application/pdf' }); var currentAddressUrl = (URL.createObjectURL(currentAddressProofBlob)) return ( {file.name} ) })}
Permanent Address Street 1 {data.permanentStreet1 ? data.permanentStreet1 : "Not Set"} Street 2 {data.permanentStreet2 ? data.permanentStreet2 : "Not Set"} City {data.permanentCity ? data.permanentCity : "Not Set"} State {data.permanentState ? data.permanentState : "Not Set"} Country {data.permanentCountry ? data.permanentCountry : "Not Set"} Permanent Address Proof: { data.permanentAddressProof.map(file => { let permanentAddressProofBlob = new Blob([file], { type: 'application/pdf' }); var permanentAddressUrl = (URL.createObjectURL(permanentAddressProofBlob)) return ( {file.name} ) })}
Emergency Contact Name: {data.emergencyName1 ? data.emergencyName1 : "Not Set"} Mobile: {data.emergencyMobile1 ? data.emergencyMobile1 : "Not Set"} RealtionShip: {data.emergencyRelationship1 ? data.emergencyRelationship1 : "Not Set"}
Job Details Hire Date: {data.jobHireDate ? data.jobHireDate : "Not Set"} Salary: {data.jobSalary ? data.jobSalary : "Not Set"} Current Salary: {data.jobCurrentSalary ? data.jobCurrentSalary : "Not Set"} Bond: {data.jobBond ? data.jobBond : "Not Set"}
Id Proof Id Proof: { data.idProof.map(file => { let idProofBlob = new Blob([file], { type: 'application/pdf' }); var idProofUrl = (URL.createObjectURL(idProofBlob)) return ( {file.name} ) })}
: ""}
); } export default Employee; {/* Name City State Country Salary Action {rows.map(row => ( {row.name} {row.calories} {row.fat} {row.carbs} {row.protein} ))}
*/} {/* */}
